definition: a person after one's heart (charming person)/capable person
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: Your attention please. Would the parent of Chloe Sanders please go to Cash Register 7 3) immediately .
sentences.chinese: 请注意，可儿山德斯的家长请即刻前往七号收银台。

sentences.english: Well wish to sister Chloe face reading in prison.
sentences.chinese: 颂恩如愿与妹妹可儿在狱中相面。

sentences.english: Kerr gave birth to their son, Flynn, on Jan. 6, 2011.
sentences.chinese: 可儿在2011年1月6日生下的他们的儿子，费林。

sentences.english: Chloe opens her book and pats her lap for Buster to jump up.
sentences.chinese: 可儿打开她的书，轻拍自己的膝盖，让巴斯特跳上来。

sentences.english: Beautiful Princess Keren, won the King's favor.
sentences.chinese: 公主斑斓可儿，深得国王地溺爱。

sentences.english: Chloe picks at the strands around its front legs.
sentences.chinese: 可儿开始剥离绕在蜥蜴前腿的丝线。

definition: pleasant/agreeable/a person after one's heart (charming person)/a gifted person
little sister/girl/(Tw) young female employee working in a low-level role dealing with the public (assistant, waitress, attendant etc)
eldest daughter of an affluent family/(polite) your daughter/bossy or indulged young woman/Miss High and Mighty
older female cousin via female line
(Tw) (Internet slang) Greetings! (used when it's unknown what time the reader will see one's post, or just to be cute)
to regret leaving/reluctant to part/(onom.) young leaves stir gently in the wind
